00045 // TYPES
00047 
00048 typedef struct {
00049     xed_decoded_inst_t d;
00050     xed_uint8_t array[XED_MAX_INSTRUCTION_BYTES];
00051     xed_uint8_t length;
00052 }  xed_decode_cache_entry_t;
00053 
00054 typedef struct {
00055     xed_decode_cache_entry_t* entries;
00056     xed_uint32_t limit;
00057     xed_uint64_t hits;
00058     xed_uint64_t misses;
00059     xed_uint64_t found_something;
00060     xed_uint64_t miscompares;
00061 } xed_decode_cache_t;
